text: The Old Nick Company, established in 1948, is the main student theatre company at the University of Tasmania. It stages a popular annual revue and other smaller productions. Past members include actor Essie Davis, Charles Wooley from the Australian 60 Minutes, journalist Helene Chung Martin, and theatre director Roger Hodgman. == External links == * http://www.oldnick.org.au/ Category:Amateur theatre companies in Australia Category:Organisations based in Tasmania
title: Old Nick Company
